author: Associated Press
title: Severe Storms Damage Dozens of Homes and Businesses in Indiana and Arkansas
description: Severe storms with high winds, hail and possible tornadoes swept across the Midwest and caused damage to dozens of homes and businesses.
content:
(MOORESVILLE, Ind.) — Severe storms with high winds, hail and possible tornadoes swept across the Midwest and caused damage to dozens of homes and businesses in parts of Indiana and Arkansas, authorities said.
A few injuries were reported following Wednesday… [+2990 chars]
